name: Short title
text:
ARTICLE 2A.
LEASES
 
Cross References
 
  Lease-purchase agreements for personal property, see chapter 481M.
 
[PART 1.  GENERAL PROVISIONS]
 
     §490:2A-101  Short title.  This article shall be known and may be cited as the Uniform Commercial Code--Leases. [L 1991, c 40, pt of §1]
